dataset_id: BOREAS TF-02 SSA-OA Tower Flux, Meteorological, and Precipitation Data
title: BOREAS TF-02 SSA-OA Tower Flux, Meteorological, and Precipitation Data
summary: Energy, carbon dioxide, water vaport, and momentum flux data collected above the canopy and in profiles through the canopy, along with meteorological data at the BOREAS SSA-OA site. Daily precipitation data from several gauges were also collected.

cmr.title: BOREAS TF-02 SSA-OA Tower Flux, Meteorological, and Precipitation Data
cmr.summary: Energy, carbon dioxide, water vaport, and momentum flux data collected above the canopy and in profiles through the canopy, along with meteorological data at the BOREAS SSA-OA site. Daily precipitation data from several gauges were also collected.
cmr.description: Energy, carbon dioxide, water vaport, and momentum flux data collected above the canopy and in profiles through the canopy, along with meteorological data at the BOREAS SSA-OA site. Daily precipitation data from several gauges were also collected.
cmr.Instrument: OZONE SENSOR, LICOR QUANTUM SENSOR, PYRANOMETERS, BAROMETERS, THERMOCOUPLES, SONIC ANEMOMETER, RAIN GAUGES, NET RADIOMETERS, IRGA, DEWPOINT HYDROMETERS
cmr.ScienceKeywords1: EARTH SCIENCE@ATMOSPHERE@ATMOSPHERIC CHEMISTRY@CARBON AND HYDROCARBON COMPOUNDS@CARBON DIOXIDE

citation: Dong, J. and W. Ni-Meister. 2011. Analysis of diurnal boundary layer development in boreal forests: measurements and simulations. Journal of Plant Ecology. 5(2):191-205.

Rahman, A.F., J.A. Gamon, D.A. Fuentes, D.A. Roberts, and D. Prentiss. 2001. Modeling spatially distributed ecosystem flux of boreal forest using hyperspectral indices from AVIRIS imagery. Journal of Geophysical Research: Atmospheres. 106(D24):33579-33591.
